title: Listening and Speaking Skills

vocab.definition: To pay attention to sounds and words with your ears
To use your voice to say words
The sound you make when you talk
Making no noise or very little noise

teachingNotes: Practice turn-taking in conversations. Use listening games and following directions activities. Encourage clear speech.
